name: Beyond The Wall - Wall Edition
description:
Barfolomew is down on his Luck, he needs money for rent otherwise he will be evicted. It just so happens he meets a "friendly" fellow who could help him with such a need. Unfortunately this character is a liar, and likes nothing more than to be-little and torture poor Barf.

We wanted to add so much more content to this game (we have about 12 other scenarios we didn't have time to make) But we hope you enjoy!

We love any kind of feedback you can give!

Feel free to keep up with our projects or follow us on twitter or twitch!

https://www.twitch.tv/jujumagicdude

https://twitter.com/SaveZeQueen
